018package org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.MAINTAINED;
021
022import java.util.Set;
023
024import org.apiguardian.api.API;
025import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
026import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils;
027import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLElement;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.internal.XMLElementImpl;
029
030/**
031 *  The abstract base class for specialised implementations of
032 *  {@link XMLElement}. Because it is derived from
033 *  {@link XMLElementImpl},
034 *  it supports attributes, namespaces, children, text, {@code CDATA} and
035 *  comments.
036 *
037 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
038 *  @version $Id: XMLElementAdapter.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $
039 *  @since 0.0.5
040 *
041 *  @UMLGraph.link
042 */
043@SuppressWarnings( {"AbstractClassNeverImplemented", "AbstractClassExtendsConcreteClass", "preview"} )
044@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: XMLElementAdapter.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $" )
045@API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.0.5" )
046public abstract non-sealed class XMLElementAdapter extends XMLElementImpl
047{
048        /*--------------*\
049    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
050        \*--------------*/
051    /**
052     *  Creates a new {@code XMLElementAdapter} instance.<br>
053     *  <br>The given element name is validated using the method that is
054     *  provided by
055     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getElementNameValidator()}.<br>
056     *  <br>The new element allows attributes and children, but will not
057     *  validate them. It also allows text.
058     *
059     *  @param  elementName The element name.
060     */
061    protected XMLElementAdapter( final String elementName ) { super( elementName ); }
062
063    /**
064     *  Creates a new {@code XMLElementAdapter} instance.<br>
065     *  <br>The given element name is validated using the method that is
066     *  provided by
067     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getElementNameValidator()}.
068     *
069     *  @note   This constructor is used for the implementation of XML
070     *      specialisations, like SVG or HTML (although this not really XML).
071     *
072     *  @param  elementName The element name.
073     *  @param  flags   The configuration flags for the new element.
074     *
075     *  @see org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLElement.Flags
076     *  @see AttributeSupport#registerAttributes(String...)
077     *  @see AttributeSupport#registerSequence(String...)
078     *  @see ChildSupport#registerChildren(String...)
079     */
080    protected XMLElementAdapter( final String elementName, final Set<Flags> flags )
081    {
082        super( elementName, flags );
083    }   //  XMLElementAdapter()
084}
085//  class XMLElementAdapter
086
087/*
088 *  End of File
089 */
